data.text:
@rajtoday Plz check unauthorized travellers  in first class compartment of HB line. Because of them we suffer lots of headache..
Plz do the needfull.
@rajtoday This means nothing unless Railways runs all the regular trains. Its shocking it has plans to discontinue extremely popular Sahyadri and Godavari Express.
@rajtoday Yesterday at Kalyan Station Ticket counter person denied to renew my SMART CARD saying that it's not opened for general public.
